title: I Won’t Go Home Without You
lyrics:
[intro] (D)  (Em)  (A)  (D)
 
I (D)asked her to stay, but she wouldn't (Em)listen
She (A)left before I had the chance to (D)say,  oh
The (Bm)words that were meant, the things that were (Em)broken
But (G)now it's far too (A)late she's gone (D)away
 
Every (D)night you cry yourself to sleep
Thinking (Bm)why does this happen to me
Why does (G)every moment have to be so (A)hard?
(A-stop) Hard to believe it
 
[chorus]
(D)It's not over tonight
Just give me one more (Em)chance to make it right
I may not make it (G)through the night
I (A)won't go home with(D)out you
 
The (Bm)taste of her breath, I'll never get (Em)over
And the (A)noises that she made keep me (D)awake, oh
The (Bm)weight of things, remain un(Em)spoken
Built (G)up so much it (A)crushed us every(D)day
 
Every (D)night you cry yourself to sleep
Thinking (Bm)why does this happen to me
Why does (G)every moment have to be so (A)hard?
(A-stop) Hard to believe it
 
[chorus]
(D)It's not over tonight
Just give me one more (Em)chance to make it right
I may not make it (G)through the night
I (A)won't go home with(D)out you
 
[chorus again!]
(D)It's not over tonight
Just give me one more (Em)chance to make it right
I may not make it (G)through the night
I (A)won't go home with(D)out you
 
(C) Of all the (G)things I felt I've (D)never really (A)showed
(F) Perhaps the (C)worst is that I (G)ever let you (A)go
Should not ever let you (A-stop)go oh oh oh oh
 
[chorus]
(D)It's not over tonight
Just give me one more (Em)chance to make it right
I may not make it (G)through the night
I (A)won't go home with(D)out you
 
[chorus again!]
(D)It's not over tonight
Just give me one more (Em)chance to make it right
I may not make it (G)through the night
I (A)won't go home with(D)out you
 
I won’t go home with(Bm)out you
I won’t go home with(G)out you
I won’t go home with(D-single strum)out you [end]
